title: Test Scores Boxplot Explorer
description: Interactive MicroSim that uses boxplots to summarize exam scores, highlighting the minimum, Q1, median, Q3, and maximum and supporting section comparisons.
subject: Statistics
learning_objective: Students will interpret a boxplot by identifying the minimum, Q1, median, Q3, and maximum and comparing two class sections.
